code: import{createSlice}from"@reduxjs/toolkit";var initialState={id:"",type:"",value:""};var AppliedDiscountSlice=createSlice({name:'appliedDiscount',initialState:initialState,reducers:{setAppliedDiscount:{reducer:function reducer(state,action){var newState={id:action.payload.id,type:action.payload.type,value:action.payload.value};return newState;}},getAppliedDiscount:function getAppliedDiscount(state,action){return state;}}});var _AppliedDiscountSlice=AppliedDiscountSlice.actions,setAppliedDiscount=_AppliedDiscountSlice.setAppliedDiscount,getAppliedDiscount=_AppliedDiscountSlice.getAppliedDiscount;export{setAppliedDiscount,getAppliedDiscount};export default AppliedDiscountSlice.reducer;
